item.title: Writing Takahē Article for gihyo.jp
item.author: shuuji3@gmail.com (TAKAHASHI Shuuji)
item.description: It was already a half year ago, but I had an opportunity to write two long articles about Takahē in Japanese on the website gihyo.jp, managed by Gijutsu-Hyoron Co., Ltd. (技術評論社), one of the famous technical book publishers in Japan:
